text:
Hi Team,
if anyone tell mw how to add trailing slash to hs_path in hubdb for dynamic pages ?

Just curious if there are any plans on the docket for an updated menu system? The current system is good for dropdown menus and basic nav, but with full width navigations and more content than just links being added into navigations, it falls a bit short. It's isn't hard to build out a nav using a custom module but the building experience with the advanced menus is extremely good for the user.
